summary: Walks-Among-Clouds is a basic male Argonian follower and merchant, available in Rorikstead.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/36341-1-1369318058.jpg[/img]


Mod: Walks-Among-Clouds (Follower)
Author: Undead Rufus


-----------
Description
-----------
This plugin adds Walks-Among-Clouds, a male Argonian follower, to the village of Rorikstead. By default he wears a customized set of Dark Brotherhood armor and dual-wields ebony swords. At the moment he is fairly basic and uses the default male Argonian voice. He can be married, and he serves as a merchant. One particular book on offer provides significant experience in one-handed and sneak. No other mods are required, but Walks-Among-Clouds should work with your favorite follower management system. I use EFF and Convenient Horses.

Required:
(none)

Recommended:
EFF - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933//?
Convenient Horses - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950//?


------------
Installation
------------
NMM installation: download the mod and activate it.

Play the game and find Walks-Among-Clouds in Rorikstead.


------------
Known Issues
------------
The book "Honor Is For Cowards," sold by Walks-Among-Clouds, can be exploited for repeated skill gain in Sneak and One-Handed.
author: Undead Rufus
